html:
2.7.21  12:16 pm   what is the meaning of "might quit"

      is it you learning blender ?
2.7.21  11:56 am   Do you have a go to microphone for vocals? It looks like you have the classic 58 for music videos, but is there something else you use for those crisps vox?

2.7.21  11:34 am   i spend a lot of my time thinking, is there a tried and true method for translating the thinking into doing?

     when is a good time to stop the think and start the do?

2.7.21  11:10 am   How do chords and chord progressions work?

     And how did you figure them out?

2.7.21  9:09 am   what to do if you're collaborating with someone, and it's going really well, and it's the first time in forever your creativity is working, but you're also slight selfish about your work and don't want to have the other person delete your opinion
2.7.21  8:30 am   How did you come up with the song Outside, since it's my favorite one?

2.7.21  7:11 am   Once you have a melody and a chord progression that you like (like a loop,

     or an A section), how do you go about making a transition into a new section (voice leading? music theory tool? Wild guessing? Wikipedia?)? THANK YOU!
2.7.21  5:50 am   how to music?
2.7.21  5:50 am   Do you ever get stuck during your songs?

2.7.21  4:18 am   bill i have tried to fix my sleep schedule by acting naturally, as you suggested a short while ago, but it's 4:18 a.m. and my sleep schedule's still screwed. do you know of any other methods that could potentially fix my sleep schedule? thank
2.7.21  2:39 am   whats your favourite song?
2.7.21  1:47 am   Is there a reason behind the "churning out creativity from my messy room" aesthetic you have in your videos? Why not get a studio?
2.7.21  1:21 am   Whats special about haiku format? Is there a particular rhythm that made people want to follow a format?
2.7.21  12:00 am   Can you show me an example of a question you answered when you were in a bad mood?
2.6.21  11:55 pm   how can i be original? just in general it's hard
2.6.21  10:45 pm   Why do I suddenly have the urge to learn things?
2.6.21  9:01 pm   How long does your videos take to make?
2.6.21  8:13 pm   What are your thoughts on the Industrial Revolution?
2.6.21  7:39 pm   how do i finish something
2.6.21  6:31 pm   Why is apostrophe so weird? Why does "Bill's" mean belonging to Bill, and "its" mean belonging to "it", but "it's" is a short-form of "it is"? Whaat?!
2.6.21  5:10 pm   Usually whenever I try to write songs to no melody, I can't think of any lyrics. Any tips on how to get around this?
2.6.21  4:58 pm   why are your answers so short and vague?
2.6.21  3:12 pm   Which of your own songs is your favourite?
2.6.21  2:46 pm   how do you know which formats(like song vs poem vs visual art vs etc.) to put your ideas into?

2.6.21  1:27 pm   How long ago did you write the song for Here comes the sun?

     The editing was really impressive
2.6.21  12:45 pm   Is the little house towards the end of "might quit" a clue that you would learn 3d animation?
2.6.21  11:59 am   What's your personality type?
2.6.21  10:18 am   do you typically write the music or the lyrics first for your longer songs?
2.6.21  9:21 am   how do i make my song less repetitive
2.6.21  8:46 am   Do you use pitch correction?
2.6.21  7:15 am   Can I ask an intelligent question?

2.6.21  6:25 am   Will you give us a straight forward answer or should we enjoy the riddles? ....

     Ooor are there no riddles? Or is the meanings of your songs just made up in my head from my personal experiences and beliefs...

      aaaaand now I hate myself for looking for deeper meanings, help?

this
2.6.21  5:00 am   what is the difference between entertainment and art?
2.6.21  4:55 am   Are you actually a human?
2.6.21  3:41 am   How did you come up with those opening notes to Slow Down, the part before "look at the time"?
2.6.21  2:23 am   do you believe in the infinite present?

2.6.21  1:20 am   for the most part, you exclude punctuation in your answers.

      Does that mean that we could interpret some of your replies as questions, declarations, or other things?
2.6.21  12:43 am   Sometimes I read your answers for inspiration, what inspires you?

2.5.21  11:11 pm   I've listened to your song la de da de da de da de day oh on repeat for the last week and a half, it's an absolute masterpiece. how do you get all those instruments to fit together like puzzle pieces? it's unbelievably intrinsic
2.5.21  10:51 pm   thoughts on magic?
2.5.21  9:44 pm   what types of music do you like listening to?
2.5.21  8:21 pm   why don't you use capital letters

2.5.21  7:49 pm   do you plan on recording all the songs that are blurred out in set-wrestling.png?

     also, what's "wall i was"?
2.5.21  6:02 pm   how to be cool

2.5.21  5:32 pm   Can you make more things like ball and stick or winning at spelling?

      Like just comedic shorts.
2.5.21  4:05 pm   What is one thing you would tell somebody just starting to make music
2.5.21  4:01 pm   how do i deal with bad parents?
2.5.21  3:56 pm   What do you do outside of making music?
2.5.21  3:50 pm   Favorite aesthetic? (in terms of Music)
2.5.21  3:00 pm   opinion about facts?
